summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4371 for the improvement of West Republican Street, from 4th Avenue West to Queen Anne Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51724, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
